alert.note: Alert for Osborne; Phillips; Smith (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 21 at 11:20PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN ROOKS... SOUTHWESTERN SMITH...NORTHWESTERN OSBORNE AND SOUTHEASTERN PHILLIPS COUNTIES THROUGH MIDNIGHT CDT... At 1119 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Phillipsburg, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Kirwin around 1135 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Agra. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for north central Kansas.
